programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: It's a play date afternoon in Toy Green and everyone is there having fun. Noddy has got a new ball for Bumpy to replace his old one that went missing. But when he finds the new ball burst in his secret cupboard he decides to investigate…. without letting Bumpy know what's happened. With Big Ears helping out by keeping Bumpy busy, Noddy and Revs are investigating against the clock to find out who burst the ball. When he finds Bumpy's original ball also burst and hidden in the kennel, he works out that the culprit is Bumpy himself! He hadn't wanted to tell anyone as he thought he'd get into trouble! Noddy reassures him that everything is okay and it's always better to tell the truth! Happily reassured, the little wooden dog happily starts playing again with his friends, using the burst ball as a Frisbee! Way to go, Noddy! Case Closed.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: The children are excited as there's a big Winter Snowdown on the fells. There's a snowman building competition, followed by a race down the snowy hill! Pat's Special Delivery is a consignment of deflated inner tubes for them to slide on, but the 4x4 hits an icy patch and slips into a ditch - and when Ted tries to rescue him, his truck gets stuck as well! On the fells competition is rife - not between the children, but with Ajay and Amy! Everyone is keen for the race to begin - but where is Pat with the inner tubes? Thanks to some cheeky sheep playing ‘follow the leader' with Jess, Pat has an idea. He and Ted pump up two of the inner tubes and Jess and the sheep pull them like huskies to the fells with the rest of the Special Delivery! Pat zooms in and saves the day - and everyone enjoys the race, including two very cheeky sheep!

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.desc: When a mysterious creature keeps stealing people’s prized possessions, the crew discovers the Nine-Tailed Fox, a trickster rooted in Chinese lore. The crew eventually comes back together and realizes that NTF takes items people think they need to be happy. Yi was able to hold onto her violin because it truly does make her happy and is a fundamental part of who she is.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show
programme.desc: While trying to teach Sherman about patience, Peabody agrees not to open a special delivery until after the show. It proves to be easier said than done.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Revenge of the Creature Catcher Casper, Mantha and Ra accidentally lead Jimmy's father to the underworld.Slugby. To prove that the teachers haven't gone soft, Alder and Dash stage a Slugby match.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: It's a play date afternoon in Toy Green and everyone is there having fun. Noddy has got a new ball for Bumpy to replace his old one that went missing. But when he finds the new ball burst in his secret cupboard he decides to investigate…. without letting Bumpy know what's happened. With Big Ears helping out by keeping Bumpy busy, Noddy and Revs are investigating against the clock to find out who burst the ball. When he finds Bumpy's original ball also burst and hidden in the kennel, he works out that the culprit is Bumpy himself! He hadn't wanted to tell anyone as he thought he'd get into trouble! Noddy reassures him that everything is okay and it's always better to tell the truth! Happily reassured, the little wooden dog happily starts playing again with his friends, using the burst ball as a Frisbee! Way to go, Noddy! Case Closed.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: The children are excited as there's a big Winter Snowdown on the fells. There's a snowman building competition, followed by a race down the snowy hill! Pat's Special Delivery is a consignment of deflated inner tubes for them to slide on, but the 4x4 hits an icy patch and slips into a ditch - and when Ted tries to rescue him, his truck gets stuck as well! On the fells competition is rife - not between the children, but with Ajay and Amy! Everyone is keen for the race to begin - but where is Pat with the inner tubes? Thanks to some cheeky sheep playing ‘follow the leader' with Jess, Pat has an idea. He and Ted pump up two of the inner tubes and Jess and the sheep pull them like huskies to the fells with the rest of the Special Delivery! Pat zooms in and saves the day - and everyone enjoys the race, including two very cheeky sheep!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: All Pip wants to do is play in the snow. Fifi tries to help him out, and come up with a brilliant idea how they can without it actually snowing!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Crocky has entrusted Raa Raa with his very special coconut to look after. Raa Raa does his very best to keep it safe. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot “Qilin” and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season 1. While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS

But when the party is over, Detective Cooper – now “Chummy Sparklestone” – refuses to break character, and he’s causing problems around the village!

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When Marcus leaves for sleep-away camp, Phoebe discovers that being a “family fairy” means helping everyone in your assigned family, not just the children. / When Tracy hires Cassie to babysit Nicholas, and Eden asks Athena and Phoebe to lend a helping hand, Cassie and the Dews must find a way to get Nicholas to bed without his missing and beloved penguin stuffy.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When Eden finds an "injured" Hammy out of his cage and helps him recuperate in her own home, she finds it harder and harder to get her "new guest" to return to his own home. / When Marcus forgets his lunch at home, Phoebe and the Dews must find a way to deliver him his lunch during his class's field trip to the park, but when they lose his lunch they must work to create a new and nutritious alternative.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Donna decides to show off her not-so-flashy skills as a magician at the Community Center talent show, the Zenkos must do everything they can to save her act from becoming an embarrassing disaster. / After Sam’s favorite skateboard accidentally gets put in with donations Mr. Tanaka is collecting for a fundraiser, the team is led on a merry chase as the skateboard passes from one Harmony Harbor denizen to another.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: Little Lula has set up a lemonade stand, but she’s not getting any business. Now it’s up to Team Zenko to get the three feuding sisters back together again before the comet streaks by.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When a swashbuckling adventurer named Waldondo comes to town, the Riders enthusiastically join him on a treasure hunt for a priceless gem.

programme.desc: The Riders find a Puffertail and train her to join the family. She struggles to learn but soon finds herself with a chance to make a big rescue.

programme.desc: When Kelp and Scallop discover Mr. Pearly has a cave full of stuff they help him to realize it could help a lot of other sea creatures. / When the group goes camping, Kelp helps Ollie learn that even though it didn’t go exactly as planned, they can still have loads of fun.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal

programme.desc: The girls get summer jobs to help Lucky repair the sprawling house she inherited from her grandfather near the Rosemead Valley Racetrack.

programme.desc: Determined to save her family home, Lucky signs up to race as a wild card in Rosemead's elite Junior Cup. But winning it all won't be easy.

programme.desc: When Pajuna’s former partner, Roz, returns to San Lorenzo asking for help with ongoing jobs, Pajuna leaves the Cantina causing Puss to have a potential breakdown

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. But they need help: Captain Underpants’ brain cells to the rescue! And when it’s all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: Youth of May (Pt. 2)
programme.desc: The human melodrama, set in Gwangju in the spring of 1980, is about the story of youths seeking to follow their destiny unaware of the historic but chaotic times that are about to fall upon them.

programme.title: The Seasons
programme.desc: A talk show brings you music and stories that will "get rid of all your worries and all your concerns."

programme.title: Two Days and One Night 4
programme.desc: Two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all the corners of Korea! Instead of fancy studio, this on-the-road reality show takes place in the rural sides. While over 10 million Koreans travel abroad each year, the "2 Days and 1 Night" casts travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of our neighbors and the beautiful nature that cleanse our eyes.

programme.title: The Return of Superman
programme.desc: Parenting challenges of "Superman" , the first hero that children encounter when they are born.

programme.title: My Neighbor, Charles
programme.desc: Foreigners, leaving their homelands behind, have come all the way to new country, South Korea. They chose South Korea not for sightseeing or short-term stay. But, they are here for various reasons, such as work, study or even marriage. The real stories of foreigners who challenge themselves to survive in Korean society will be unfolded!

programme.title: Our Golden Days
programme.desc: Everyone has their golden days. Whether now, in the past, or the future. A heartfelt family melodrama that resonates across generations, exploring those dazzling days we all encounter with different meanings.

programme.title: Heart on Wheels
programme.desc: An observational variety show where a mobile convenience store packed with daily necessities is delivered to a rural village, and the night is spent there.

programme.title: Got The Spot in Gangnam
programme.desc: Famous influencers visit Korea's most iconic spots to experience and explore them.

programme.title: My Only One
programme.desc: A woman's life gets twisted one day because of her biological father who shows up after 28 years of absence. He had been thoroughly hiding his identity, afraid that he might be an obstacle in his daughter's life. The father and daughter meet the "only ones" in their lives and put back together the pieces of their broken hearts.

This drama features young people and how they grow as real journalists.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Army of One
programme.desc: Special Forces agent Brenner and her husband stumble upon an illegal drug compound in the woods while hiking. The drug dealers capture them, kill her husband, and leave her for dead. Not only does Brenner escape alive, she is also seething with rage and vows to hunt down all who murdered her husband and take revenge!

programme.title: Engaged To Be Murdered
programme.desc: Amanda Finley will stop at nothing to keep her son Jackson from marrying Olivia, who she suspects of being after his money.

programme.title: Vacation Home Nightmare
programme.desc: When a woman is attacked in her short-term rental, the company's Clean-Up Team steps in to help her. But she finds that the head of the team might be cleaning up his own crimes.

programme.title: The Podcast Murders
programme.desc: A true crime podcaster tries to keep a low profile despite achieving success for her investigation of the case she calls the "Barbie Murders." But soon her anonymity isn't the only thing being threatened.

programme.title: Killer Fortune Teller
programme.desc: When Michael, an older single man looking for companionship, falls for alluring psychic Janis, she sees him as an easy mark. But will Janis be exposed by Virginia, Michael's concerned relative?

programme.title: Yuri's Winning Recipe (S2)
programme.desc: Yuri has been passionately posting home-cooked food on her Instagram account. Is there any better way to fall in love with cooking than experimenting with new recipes and sharing them with viewers?

programme.title: Hit-and-Miss Tour (S1)
programme.desc: Waking up early one morning, the Dokbakz are all hungry and ready to head out for breakfast. But when they arrive at the restaurant, they are met with an unexpected surprise.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S17)
programme.desc: Curtis Stone returns for the second night in a row and sets up the ultimate challenge, to create a winter warmer ice-cream and pair it with a dessert.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: Korean fried chicken is one of John's favourite dishes. Rachael prepares this sweet and spicy meal at home and shows how to pair the dish with Persian cucumbers, daikon radishes and kimchi.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S6)
programme.desc: The zombie team has their work cut out for them when they discover a 3bed/2bath might be missing a bedroom! Termites, collapsing ceilings and some surprises might just be a budget-buster!

programme.title: The Podcast Murders
programme.desc: A true crime podcaster tries to keep a low profile despite achieving success for her investigation of the case she calls the "Barbie Murders." But soon her anonymity isn't the only thing being threatened.

programme.title: Road Trip Hostage
programme.desc: When pursuing her dreams leads to a fractured relationship with her mother, a young student leaves home, but soon finds herself the hostage of a criminal who forces her to drive him across the country.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S17)
programme.desc: Curtis Stone returns for the second night in a row and sets up the ultimate challenge, to create a winter warmer ice-cream and pair it with a dessert.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: Rachael has always dreamed of creating her own line of flavoured popcorn. She incorporates her favourite flavour combinations in a crowd-pleasing recipe for dill popcorn shrimp.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S6)
programme.desc: Chauncey and Derek team up with Project Manager. But with giant holes in the floor, roaches, and all sorts of unspeakable muck, the budget and timeline quickly balloon.

programme.title: MasterChef USA (S13)
programme.desc: The Mystery Box is back and it’s every chef for themselves. Without the protection of their regional teams, the chefs must individually face the challenge of preparing a gourmet meal out of army rations.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: Rachael prepares a flavourful Korean-style taco with a spicy, soy-based recipe that perfectly combines salty and sweet ingredients.

programme.title: Best In Chow
programme.desc: Nebraska is one of the largest fairs in the country. Culinary entrepreneurs come from all over vying to fill the bellies of the cornhuskers. Putting their own spin on Nebraska's famous beef, corn, pork.

programme.title: All Fixed Up In An Empty Village (S3)
programme.desc: After the intense battle for empty homes, special missions are assigned to the four. Enter Yoo Jung-soo, the “spatial planning master”, who reinterprets the village revival project.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: Rachael shows how to make a hearty beef stew that is both versatile and delicious and serves it with her mother's famous "pucky huddle" potato fries.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2)

programme.title: Dalhin Mo Ako Sa Langit
programme.desc: Lani (Ynez Veneracion) is an ambitious village lass who wants to better her life. She uses her beauty towards this end and manages to worm her way into a rich family.

programme.title: Kanto Boy 2 (Anak Ni Totoy Gwapo)
programme.desc: Guiller, the son of the notorious Totoy Guwapo grew up as an orphan. He ended up in prison after accidentally killing a man in a street fight and it was there that he came to terms with life and discovered his own identity.

programme.title: Hindi Mo Ako Kayang Tapakan
programme.desc: This is the story of Tacing--a woman involved in different love affairs, which resulted in endless trials and tribulations. Nardo, Tom, Ramon and Angelito, were just some of the many men who became part of Tacing's life and played parts in making her accept the reality of womanhood.

programme.title: Hatulan: Bilibid Boys 2
programme.desc: Bilibid Boys are young and daring but lost in a cruel society.

programme.title: Silang Mga Sisiw Sa Lansangan
programme.desc: Four kids stow away from home and became streetchildren. A philantrophist adopted them and treated them as his family until they were held hostages. The kidnapping became news headline which eventually made their parents to know their where-abouts.

programme.title: Kumukulong Dugo
programme.desc: Kumukulong Dugo

programme.title: Minsan Pa (Kahit Konting Pagtingin 2) (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The sequel to the first blockbuster team-up of FPJ and Sharon Cuneta in "Kahit Konting Pagtingin". This time around, their roles were reversed. Now that they had been given a second chance, they became determined to find out.

programme.title: Humanap Ka Ng Panget (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Andrew E made his acting debut in this wacky comedy based on his big hit "Humanap Ka ng Panget". The message of the song is that if you want to be happy it is best to fall in love with an ugly woman or man who will be grateful for your love and will do anything you want.

programme.title: Mandurugas
programme.desc: Comedians Dennis Padilla and Janno Gibbs took on the spotlight in this film, which was their first screen team-up. The wacky duo played small-time con-men who, for a quick buck, would do anything or become anything.

programme.title: Okey Si Ma'am
programme.desc: Keempee, Donna, Paco and Lander played high school senior students each having their own personal dilemmas. Ms. Sonia (Alice Dixson), with her unorthodox way of teaching became their counselor and friend who brought out the best in her students.

programme.title: Tondo, Libingan Ng Mga Siga
programme.desc: Tondo, where gangs proliferate and crime is a way of life. This is the home of Willie Cuevas, who made his living doing the dirty work for a corrupt law enforcer.

programme.title: Bakit Kay Tagal Ng Sandali?
programme.desc: Nina (Dina Bonnevie) and Ted (Julio Diaz) are sweethearts. Ted convinces her to accept Don Edmundo's (Eddie Garcia) suit as the old man is said to be dying anyway.

programme.title: Lalakwe
programme.desc: Anna falls in love with and gives her womanhood to womanizer Eric who promises her marriage. Upon her brother’s insistence to meet the man, she realizes then that Eric is married.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 5

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 6
programme.desc: A cute comic book artist (guest star COURTNEY FORD) puts Leonard's relationship with Priya to the test; while Sheldon, getting into the spirit of Halloween, tries to scare the guys.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 7

programme.desc: Amy is heartbroken when Bernadette and Penny go shopping for wedding dresses without her.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect Special: Top 5 Freakouts
programme.desc: In this special episode, Michael presents the show's top five funniest reactions, from the downright horrified to the hilariously mystified.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect Special: Secret Stash
programme.desc: Michael shows lobster secretion is the future of hair care. And later, Michael proves he can make a woman believe anything, except that she's on a TV show.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect Special: Behind The Curtain
programme.desc: Using never-before-seen footage, Michael shares backstage secrets, the most epic freak out, and hilarious moments of recognition.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect Special: Trick Plays
programme.desc: Things get really heated in the bowling alley, hazards on the golf course come out of nowhere, and during a workout, Michael shows that dramatic transformations can happen in an instant.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect Special: Gadgets And Gizmos
programme.desc: From an electric removable eyeball to a 3D printing pen, this episode features the best reactions to Michael's most innovative creations.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect Special: Over The Line
programme.desc: First, Michael transforms during a scaly science experiment that goes terribly wrong, and later, an employee bolts for help in the most outrageous reveal in Carbonaro history.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect Special: Hit Or Miss
programme.desc: There's a fine line between a great trick and a complete disaster. Find out as Michael goes back in time with this special full of never before seen hits… or are they misses?

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect: Holiday Survival Guide
programme.desc: Michael takes viewers behind the scenes and shows them never before seen tricks.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect: Double Takes
programme.desc: From the arcade to the science lab, Michael revisits the classic moments of invisibility, teleportation and shape-shifting with footage from the cutting room floor.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 05
programme.desc: Michael reveals the transformative properties of fruits and vegetables, and shows a caterer the true power of dairy products. Plus, an antique store customer is stunned when a species of termite literally chews through the scenery!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 06
programme.desc: At an antique store, Michael shows off an impossible way to organize your clothes, and back at the supermarket we find out that there are some serious surprises lurking in our favorite foods. Finally, at the Navy Yard, Michael pushes his skills to the limit when he attempts one of his most ambitious feats yet - tricking two people at the same time!

programme.title: Miracle Workers S3 1
programme.desc: Small-town reverend Ezekiel Brown enlists outlaw Benny the Teen to lead his people west along the Oregon Trail.

programme.title: Miracle Workers S3 2
programme.desc: The wagon train must ford a dangerous river, leading to a moral struggle between Ezekiel and Benny over the soul of the group. Meanwhile, Prudence and Todd meet hipster pioneers living #wagonlife.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect: Double Takes 2
programme.desc: It's Déjà vu all over again in part 2 of our mind bending special where Michael shares brand new takes on his favorite tricks with never-before-seen footage!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect: Double Takes 3
programme.desc: Michael takes viewers behind the scenes and shows them never seen tricks.

programme.title: Hack My Life S4 8
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin go head-to-head testing out hacks to make your pool party the event of the year.

programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. programme.title: Landline: India Special
programme.desc: From farm to fashion, cotton and wool grown in Australia, made in India and exported to the world. How a new trade deal opens up new mass markets and partnerships for Australian farmers.

programme.title: Camel Capers
programme.desc: Max Bergmann is a Paralympian, a scientist, and a passionate camel farmer. He's also legally blind but, as he says, he has a vision for developing Australia's camel industry.

programme.title: Black Snow
programme.desc: Cormack tries to track Anton down to question him, but he's disappeared. When Cormack and Hazel discover that Kalana is also missing, they fear the worst.

programme.title: Living With Fire
programme.desc: Timber towns in New South Wales are against the clock to salvage trees killed in bushfires. Blackened logs can still be processed, but the loss of timber from pine plantations creates economic uncertainty for the region.

programme.title: Alone Australia
programme.desc: The remaining survivalists come face to face with their physical limitations. Can innovation save the day, or will a routine med check bring one survivalist to the end of the journey?

programme.title: Loving Gluten Free
programme.desc: Helen shares the perfect recipe for your next taco Tuesday, 'Mexican Pulled Pork Tacos'. The Mexican theme continues as Helen checks out 'Hotel Jesus' with head chef Matt Lane.

programme.title: The Streets Hong Kong
programme.desc: Dan journeys to Hong Kong's picturesque coastal region of Sai Kung where local chef, Margaret Xu cooks him a sublime steamed crab dish. He then searches for a restaurant that specialises in traditional Chinese sweet soups.

programme.title: Gardening Australia
programme.desc: We meet Pungky Nanda Pratama, an inspiring young conservationist working to protect Sumatra's rainforests through education, collaboration and cultivation of salvaged plants.

programme.title: Landline
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: Offsiders
programme.desc: It's the final round of the AFL regular season and the makeup of the Finals will be decided. Abbey Gelmi and the panel cover the week in sport including the race for Top 8 spots in the NRL, NRLW, Round 2 of the AFLW and more.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show
programme.desc: Join Tiana Penitani Gray and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: News Breakfast
programme.desc: As each day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. Bridget Brennan and James Glenday present the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories, joined by Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Kathryn Robinson brings you today's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter most.

programme.title: A Bite To Eat With Alice
programme.desc: Comedy legend Denise Scott joins Alice in the kitchen. Before she arrives, Alice whips up an '80s classic - the scotch egg. Denise pops in with a basket full of vegetables asking Alice to help her fall back in love with them.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent
programme.desc: In Spain protests against mass tourism have erupted across the nation. Angry locals demand action to stop hordes of tourists from occupying their cities. Tourism is being blamed for a housing crisis that's forcing locals out.

programme.title: First Weapons
programme.desc: Australia's most lethal boomerang, the Wartilykirri. Host Phil Breslin and weapon maker Joseph Williams unpack this non-returning boomerang and witness its manoeuvrability and force in a medieval battle. (Final)

programme.title: Culture By Design
programme.desc: The final episode introduces audiences to brilliant women designers from across Asia, featuring an architect and graphic designer in Indonesia and ceramicist in India.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia
programme.desc: Rookie architect Nick is aiming to solve Australia's housing crisis by showing that good design is affordable for everyone.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing
programme.desc: As a new sitting week begins in Canberra, Patricia Karvelas is here at 4pm AEST Weekdays to bring you the latest in politics, national and global affairs, posing the tough questions on the big issues to the decision makers.

programme.desc: Allan Quatermain once again teams up with Jesse Huston where the discovery of a mysterious old gold piece sends Quatermain looking for his long-lost brother, missing in the wilds of Africa after seeking a lost white race.

programme.title: The Chronicles Of Riddick

But, unfortunately, Dad and his two klutzy cohorts are too busy with a get-rich-quick scheme, illegally paving the road to financial bliss...that is, until Timmy steps into their path. Recognizing that only he can set his father straight, this inventive kid puts an end to their plans and makes Ray do time...as a dad!

programme.title: Nuuk
